original_text: Image FDA alerts consumers of potentially harmful over-the-counter (OTC) skin products containing hydroquinone or mercury. These products are not FDA approved for over-the-counter sale. Learn more and...

qa_pairs.text_input: What are the two substances found in over-the-counter skin products that are not FDA-approved?
What is the name of the campaign launched by the FDA to educate consumers about the risks of unsafe skin products?
In what languages are the FDA's educational materials available?
qa_pairs.output: Multiple languages including Spanish, French, Haitian Creole, Hindi, Hmong, Chinese (Simplified and Traditional), and Arabic
